you should also look in /etc/modprobe.d/  for a file name blacklist-ath5k or somesuch, make sure you are blacklisting ath_pci and ath_hal but NOT ath5k

it says - in the blacklist-ath_pci.conf - that "For some atheros 5k RF MACs, the madwifi driver loads but fails to correctly initialize the hardware, leaving it in a state from which ath5k cannot recover.  To prevent this condition, stop madwifi from loading by default.  use Jockey to select one driver or the other. (Ubuntu: #315056, #323830)"

there will be lines below that detailing blacklisted modules, blacklist all except ath5k
